entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Rainbow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: High Level Airport 6:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow with periods of freezing rain this evening and with periods of rain overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to periods of snow in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
